attributes.action: Help Greece & Lesbos by offering asylum to families and unaccompanied children.
attributes.additional_details: We should never pass by on the other side of the road.
attributes.background: The Government must take a humanitarian approach to resolving the hardship faced by refugees on Lesbos and immediately take a fair proportion of families and unaccompanied children, and process their claims in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550686
